channel.title: [562]Project Elite-Pkz[562]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt]Project Percentage: 67% - Fully working duel arena turnys 90%[/size][/b][/center]
[center]Project Still working In beta mode...[/center]
Updates so far: Rune Defender Mini Game 100% Torso Mini game 80% Duel arena turnments 90% Soul Wars 90% (Adding Zeal system) Pest Control 30% Mini G.E. System 10% - Adding tons more items that are buy able from the mini g.e. Summoning 90% - Adding Dismiss monster Never before used home 90% All 23 Skills working - 90% (Having trouble with construction :D) ________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Pictures: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/140m81w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/qrna5j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/16l0ab9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2u95sth.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/5uicea.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2r5t2fm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2ypm58n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2bbc6o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2n6an81.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/35b8085.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/14nu3r.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/smafrl.png[/img]
More pics comming soon!
Please post positive comments, don't need negative....
Coders: 1. Mod Zak (Pkzorofrs@hotmail.com - MSN)

item.title: [562]Project Elite-Pkz[562]
item.dc:creator: @Rip_pking Rip pking
item.description:
@Rip_pking wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:10, topic:338159”]You want to avoid adding objects in a 562 source. The mapdata is unstable, and it will massively spawn your object through out it,

  1. From the minigame, it looks just like a simple npc drop?
  2. Duel Arena, decent job, but you could create a player option if there in the duel area called “duel”, then use interfaces, and buttons to finish it up. If you have pkzevolution beta, the one i posted on forums for awhile. That has a decent starter for it.
    Overall 5/10

Doesn’t seem like you did much, just spawned a few npcs, added a few drops, ect.[/quote]

Smart one I added a lot more than just a few NPC drops…You need a addy defender to attack the rune guys, to get addy defender you have to complete a miniquest.

And for duel, its called duel turnments.

Read full topic

item.title: [562]Project Elite-Pkz[562]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

You want to avoid adding objects in a 562 source. The mapdata is unstable, and it will massively spawn your object through out it,

  1. From the minigame, it looks just like a simple npc drop?
  2. Duel Arena, decent job, but you could create a player option if there in the duel area called “duel”, then use interfaces, and buttons to finish it up. If you have pkzevolution beta, the one i posted on forums for awhile. That has a decent starter for it.
    Overall 5/10

Doesn’t seem like you did much, just spawned a few npcs, added a few drops, ect.

Read full topic
